archetype.name: Location
archetype.description: Archetype for locations, such as regions, countries, areas, cities, sites, campuses, buildings, offices, etc.

assignment.description: This archetype can be applied to orgs (OrgType).

inducement.description: Locations are hierarchical and have "members" (users) located in them.

assignmentRelation.description: User can belong to a location (be located here).

Sub-locations. Locations are hierarchical, there can be locations within locations. Offices are located within campuses, which are located within cities, which are located within countries, which are located within regions.
